00009 @implementation UITraversal
00010 
00011 @synthesize views, className, redoer, timeout, first, last, all, redo;
00012 
00013 +(id)withViews:(NSMutableArray *)views className:(NSString *)className {
00014         return [UIRedoer withTarget:[[[self alloc] initWithViews:views className:className] autorelease]];
00015 }
00016 
00017 -(id)initWithViews:(NSMutableArray *)_views className:(NSString *)_className {
00018         [UIQuery swizzleFilters];
00019         if (self = [super init]) {
00020                 self.timeout = 10;
00021                 self.views = _views;
00022                 self.className = _className;
00023         }
00024         return self;
00025 }
00026 
00027 -(NSArray *)collect:(NSArray *)views {
00028         return [[[[UIDescendants alloc] init] autorelease] collect:views];
00029 }
00030 
00031 -(NSArray *)targetViews {
00032         return (views.count == 0) ? [NSArray array] : [NSArray arrayWithObject:[views objectAtIndex:0]];
00033 }
00034 
00035 -(UIQuery *)timeout:(int)seconds {
00036         UIQuery *copy = [UIQuery withViews:views className:className];
00037         copy.timeout = seconds;
00038         return copy;
00039 }
00040 
00041 -(id)templateFilter {
00042         NSString *viewName = NSStringFromSelector(_cmd);
00043         return [self view:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"UI%@", [viewName stringByReplacingCharactersInRange:NSMakeRange(0,1) withString:[[viewName substringWithRange:NSMakeRange(0,1)] uppercaseString]]]];
00044 }
00045 
00046 -(UIQuery *)index:(int)index {
00047         if (index >= views.count) {
00048                 NSLog(@"UISPEC WARNING: %@ doesn't exist at index %i", className, index);
00049         }
00050         NSArray *resultViews = (index >= views.count) ? [NSArray array] : [NSArray arrayWithObject:[views objectAtIndex:index]];
00051         return [UIQuery withViews:resultViews className:className];
00052 }
00053 
00054 -(UIQuery *)first {
00055         return [self index:0];
00056 }
00057 
00058 -(UIQuery *)last {
00059         return [self index:views.count - 1];
00060 }
00061 
00062 -(UIQuery *)all {
00063         return [UIQueryAll withViews:views className:className];
00064 }
00065 
00066 -(UIQuery *)view:(NSString *)className {
00067         NSMutableArray *array = [NSMutableArray array];
00068         NSDate *start = [NSDate date];
00069         while ([start timeIntervalSinceNow] > (0 - timeout)) {
00070                 [self wait:.25];
00071                 NSArray *views = [self collect:[self targetViews]];
00072                 Class class = NSClassFromString(className);
00073                 for (UIView * v in views) {
00074                         if ([v isKindOfClass:class]) {
00075                                 [array addObject:v];
00076                         } 
00077                 }
00078                 if (array.count > 0) {
00079                         break;
00080                 }
00081         }
00082         if ([className isEqualToString:@"UITableViewCell"]) {
00083                 return [UIQueryTableViewCell withViews:array className:className];
00084         } else if ([className isEqualToString:@"UITableView"]) {
00085                 return [UIQueryTableView withViews:array className:className];
00086         } else {
00087                 return [UIQuery withViews:array className:className];
00088         }
00089 }
00090 
00091 -(UITraversal *)wait:(double)seconds {
00092         CFRunLoopRunInMode(kCFRunLoopDefaultMode, seconds, false);
00093         return [UIQuery withViews:views className:className];
00094 }
00095 
00096 -(id)redo {
00097         if (redoer != nil) {
00098                 UIRedoer *redone = [redoer redo];
00099                 redoer.target = redone.target;
00100                 self.views = [[redoer play] views];
00101         }
00102         //return is provided by uiredoer
00103 }
00104 
00105 -(void)dealloc {
00106         self.views = nil;
00107         self.className = nil;
00108         self.redoer = nil;
00109         [super dealloc];
00110 }
